channel.title: Range - Arrows fly through the air
channel.description:
Ok does anyone know how to make the arrow fly through the air? Something like a mage attack? I have tried to replicate the mage attack & transform it into range but i couldnt get it to work. Does anyone have any ideas/hints/tips which may help here?
All help is welcome.

item.title: Range - Arrows fly through the air

Lol thanks ill try this.

Read full topic

what about if you set it it 0

[quote=“kapokliukaz, post:4, topic:59700”]i think you can only add the gfx of crystal here

 staticAnimation(250, absX, absY, 100);

use it if you know how[/quote]Yes, but if you have the 100 there then the arrow will shoot south, and if your fireing a shot towards the north then the arrow will be shot out of your back.
